JobFullDesc: Are you a technology leader with extensive implementation experience over an ecosystem of applications for an organization? Do you have a good understanding of how technology capabilities work in concert together to deliver business value?As a Technical Architect in the HR Strategy and Solution (HRSS) practice, you will work alongside the HRSS Digital Solutions practice, our Developers, UX Designers and Strategy thinkers, cracking problems with a mix of technical expertise and innovative thinking across the clients overall digital enterprise infrastructure. You will act as a catalyst for change and lead an IT transformation team that will grow and thrive by challenging accepted IT practices and the status quo. Work you'll do  Lead / oversee the execution of technical activities by working with various Product Owners to identify/coordinate what is needed to achieve target outcome  Lead technical conversations across product teams and define technical feasibility of the work outcomes  Perform current state technical ecosystem assessments  Assist in Tech capability mapping for agreed work outcomes  Ensure the right technology and/or tools are utilized to deliver the technical outputs  Assist in validating / sizing work outcome user stories  Map the organization's ecosystem of technology capabilities to enable the value flow  Encourage continuous improvement and maintain high performing teams  Encourage team collaboration and help developers work through issues  Facilitate delivery using the Scrum framework; ensuring that Scrum is understood and followed  Create an environment in which the team is effective by ensuring value is delivered to stakeholders  Maintain a good relationship between the team and Product Owner, as well as others outside the team Qualifications Required:  Bachelor's Degree  10+ years of experience in Technical Architecture  5+ years of experience in Cloud infrastructure  Preferred:  External Consulting Experience  Background working across the full IT Architecture infrastructure About the HR Transformation teamThe HR Transformation team is a core component of our Human Capital practice - the work we do supports the five major issues our clients are facing. We collaborate with our clients to develop leading global HR strategies and support organizations in achieving excellence through implementing solutions that transform how they organize, develop capabilities, deploy leading technology, and deliver a leading employee experience. Keeping the employee in mind, all our services cater to improving an organization's productivity through their human capital asset. The client issues we work with range from the need for a comprehensive HR strategy to determining the need for new and enabling technologies, to streamlining HR operations and transforming the way HR is delivered.#IND:CONS  #HRT22
